articles.author: Jo He-rim, Jo He-rim
articles.title: AI in your pocket: Samsung Galaxy S to feature real-time phone call translator - asianews.network
articles.description: The new real-time call translation function would work as a “personal translator,” and will be integrated into the device’s call feature.
articles.content:
SEOUL – Samsung Electronics flagship Galaxy S smartphones will offer a real-time translation function for phone calls, the tech giant said Thursday.
The surprise announcement comes a day after it un… [+2704 chars]
